rules.description: 1 (Cmd) [Open first pinned Dock app (Finder); +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
2 (Cmd) [Open second pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
3 (Cmd) [Open third pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
4 (Cmd) [Open fourth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
5 (Cmd) [Open fifth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
6 (Cmd) [Open sixth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
7 (Cmd) [Open seventh pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
8 (Cmd) [Open eighth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
9 (Cmd) [Open ninth pinned Dock app; +IDEs and Terminal Emulators]
Home key to the beginning of the line (Control + a)
End key to the end of the line (Control + e)
Home key to the beginning of the sentence (Command + Left). Doesnt work in terminal
End key to the end of the sentence (Command + Right). Doesnt work in terminal
PC-Style Screenshot to File (PrintScreen to select)
PC-Style Screenshot to Clipboard (PrintScreen to select)
PC-Style Screenshot (PrintScreen for whole, Shift+PrintScreen to select)
Map Ctrl+Shift+L to Cmd+Shift+G in Finder (Go to Folder)
